title: when your team feeds bots in a co op game

replies.body: I nearly lost a game because my midlaner fed Annie Bot. Our Hecarim had to splitpush top while I held that Annie away from my team xd
It really isn't that hard to feed Annie Bot. I mean, god damn, he's practically challenger!

ive had 1 real person in my game and 3 bots feeding the hack out of the enemy bot team...

 i dont remember winning that game
I don't see how this becomes a problem. I can 1v5 a bot game (although, to be fair, co-op is medium difficulty bots).
I was slacking while leveling an account. It's quite challenging to play without runes and masteries (at least until you get ahead a bit)
I only recall losing once in a bot match. I was trying out Singed and **everyone** on my team went AFK!

Shoulda proxied.

EDIT: No but seriously, if you had base proxied 1v5 against bots, you would have won.
dont the bots also go afk if your teammates go afk?
They do now. They didn't used to. First time I tried Darius (Old Darius) was in a bot match. Everyone went afk except for me and our support Lulu. 2v5. Somehow we still managed to win.
They do, they even out the match. Although I think once you drop an inhib tower they reactivate.
You'd think.

I play bot games even now. In 3 years I lost 20 bot games. 18 during leveling up, 2 when I was playing the game in solo lane and somehow didn't noticed bots are 23/3 and just knocked down inhib tower :D Then I was unable to 1v5. Tunneled so hard in those games... :D

http://img.memecdn.com/praying-cat_o_328064.jpg

the only reaction
Except if it was the doom bots...

It's so obvious... **THEY'RE BOTS!**

ROBO WARS CONFIRMED
so true
What? They're too stupid to know what they're doing. I wanted an actual challenge!
http://cdn2.teen.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/12/home-alone-2-kevin-we-all-do.gif
It's perfectly fine to feed Annie Bot xD

Tell me about it, was leveling an EUW account:

http://puu.sh/rrRBt/be388d236b.png

https://puu.sh/pMEMC/aa52f41cca.jpg

When your leader instincts kicking and the fact you don't want to have a loss in botgame... 
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

I once was playing a game with a friend, I can't remember who we were playing, but we went in for a bot game just for funsies and the other three players decided to walk down through mid whenever they spawned. They fed the midlaner bot, a yasuo, I think, so hard that it started running to the other lanes at 10 min and was two-shotting us. There was a moment of hope once we killed it, but we couldn't get to the inhib quick enough and he caught us under the tower and killed us both. As the tears were flowing from our eyes, I realized that it was not meant to be... so I hit surrender, to my everlasting shame... but they all voted no! The rest of it was a blur and I just remember tilting hard and losing the game at 45ish minutes.{{item:3070}}
Never, EVER feed a yasuo, even if it's a bot!
I remember my first game as soraka, I had no clue what I was doing and went midlane and i'm pretty sure we lost XD
it's kinda funny since I used to go lux and spam forbidden idol(my first few games) and go mid XD(this was before the tem change for upgrading heals)
bot match. trying master yi. twisted treeline. i didn't do too good. {{champion:157}} bot account for an ally. ***fed. like. no. tomorrow.***
I've actually had fun with some friends in a bot game when we decided to feed the Ryze bot, then it spiraled out of control. (Old Ryze btw)

I carried one of those games as AP Sej

It was a fun time
I used to be the worst feeder in bots. I didn't understand the game at all and just went for kills.
If we are talking about level 1 to 5 new accounts, this is perfectly normal. Even smurfs have some trouble cleaning all the bots without Masteries and runes.

> [{quoted}](name=Awhegark,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=NglN1buw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-28T15:06:24.208+0000)
>
>Even smurfs have some trouble cleaning all the bots without Masteries and runes.

On my smurf (Yes I have a smurf and it is obviously a smurf because of the name, no I have not played on it in a while) I once had to carry a bot game 1v5 because everyone on my team wanted to surrender. They fed the bots an insane amount. It is a good thing that I have quite high general experience with league and bot AI in general. That game should have been over 30 mins earlier than when I ended it.

i feel sorry for you.
http://tse4.mm.bing.net/th?id=OIP.M6e4cd1e6b29a3738b4f6f38540ae1664o0&pid=15.1

im talkin at least lvl 10's

and yes this happened to me in a game recently, fortunately

{{champion:23}} my right arm is a lot stronger then my left one
